companies.name: Ecuadeli
companies.address: Av. Francisco de Orellana, Edif. World Trade Center, Piso 11, Oficina 1101, Guayaquil
companies.other_information: Ecuadeli is a leading Ecuadorian company dedicated to the exportation of high-quality products such as shrimp, tuna, and other seafood products.

companies.name: Natura Futura
companies.address: Calle Julio Zaldumbide N32-361 y Av. Occidental, Quito
companies.other_information: Natura Futura is an Ecuadorian company committed to sustainable agriculture practices, offering organic and fair-trade products such as cocoa, coffee, and honey.

companies.name: Lio Internacional
companies.address: Calle Isla Genovesa E9-109 y Av. Interoceánica, Quito
companies.other_information: Lio Internacional is an Ecuadorian logistics company specializing in international freight forwarding and customs brokerage services.

companies.name: Frutexport
companies.address: Av. José María Velasco Ibarra, Km 21, Guayaquil
companies.other_information: Frutexport is a leading Ecuadorian exporter of fresh fruits, including bananas, pineapples, and mangoes, to international markets.

companies.name: Cacao del Ecuador
companies.address: Calle París E11-205 y Av. 10 de Agosto, Quito
companies.other_information: Cacao del Ecuador is dedicated to the production and exportation of premium Ecuadorian cocoa beans, known for their exceptional flavor and aroma.

companies.name: Industrias Ales
companies.address: Calle Venezuela 212 y Av. Manabí, Guayaquil
companies.other_information: Industrias Ales is a leading Ecuadorian manufacturer of plastic products, serving diverse industries including agriculture, construction, and packaging.

companies.name: Incauca

companies.other_information: Incauca is an Ecuadorian company specializing in the production and exportation of high-quality sugar products, including raw sugar, refined sugar, and specialty sugars.
